Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.Image
      • pl.isangeles.senlin.inter.InterfaceObject
        • pl.isangeles.senlin.inter.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.Renderable

    public final class Button
extends InterfaceObject
implements org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener
    Interface button class, implements MouseListener to detect mouse click
    Author:
    Isangeles
